Text:
Many many thanks GOPO for uploading these amazing movies. I really appreciate the quality and the type of movies you do.

Would you be so kind enough to tell the movies which you will upload from your list?

Please... anxiously waiting for your reply.
I downloaded another source for Audition because from the first one I couldn't extract the sound so that means that I'll have to rip the movie again.

Thanks A Lot.

I Was Thinking About This One Just 2 Days Ago.

Wonderful.

Outstanding quality..excellent selections.THANK YOU.

Any chance to get Jean de Florette and Manon des Sources is high res?

thanks again.
No,there is no chance because there are no high-resolution sources for those movies and I don't take requests.

I will ask everyone who downloaded any of my movies and liked the quality to give them +1 quality because I saw some movies with a lot of thanks comments and -1-2 quality.That's just retarded if you ask me...so remember,+1 if you like the quality.
